page.title: 08Housing
page.content: Housing in this block is concentrated into two areas _ Ashton village is the principal area and the second area is the Manley _ Mouldsworth region.The Ashton housing area is compact but the Mouldsworth _ Manley area is scattered .Ashton is split into four housing estates.The oldest part of Ashton is the centre of the village.On the eastern side of the village there is an estate of detatched houses and bungalows.We interviewed forty households in Ashton. Only two have been built in the last ten years and four are over fifty years old.About half are detatched and a quarter are bungalows.75% have central heating,50% have double glazing, but there are no houses with solar heating.50% of houses have three bedrooms,95% have three bedrooms or more.On average in our survey 3.6 people live in a house.
